com.jfinal.ext.kit

类 PageViewKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jfinal.ext.kit.PageViewKit

  • public final class PageViewKit
extends Object
    PageViewKit |-- | |-- META-INF | |-- WEB-INF |-- classes |-- errorpages | |-- 403.jsp | |-- 404.jsp | `-- 500.jsp |-- lib `-- pageviews |-- login | |-- login.jsp `-- ..jsp |-- admin | |-- .. | `-- .. `-- .. 
       web.xml:
        
                403
                /WEB-INF/errorpages/403.jsp
        
        
                404
                /WEB-INF/errorpages/404.jsp
        
        
                500
                /WEB-INF/errorpages/500.jsp

    Jobsz
